projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Get user's location and show its current weatherUsers can toggle between Fahrenheit and Celcius degree, whichever they prefer. Powered by DarkSky API.

projects.name: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: Classic Tic Tac Toe game, user can choose whether X or O and try to beat computer A.I. Built with vanilla Javascript and miniMax algorithm.

projects.name: Simon game
projects.description: Another classic game from the 80s. There are 20 levels in total, user should memorize the sequence given randomly by computer and perform them orderly. Built with the help of jQuery

projects.name: Random Quote Machine
projects.description: Generate new quote every time user hits "new quote" button. User can tweet the current quote using "Tweet it" button.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: It's a basic calculator with 2 additional function such as percentage and decimal number.

projects.name: Twitch TV
projects.description: Twitch TV app, user can see which channels are streaming and their status or which channels are offline. Built with the help of Twitch TV API.

projects.name: Pomodoro Clock
projects.description: User can use this app to control their work-flow. They can set the length of session (traditionally 25 mins), and break-time length. Timer will be fired once start button is clicked.

projects.name: Markdown
projects.description: User can type GitHub-flavored Markdown into a text area. User can instantly see the output in the right section when typing. Built with the help of Marked library, React.js and Sass

projects.name: FreeCodeCamp Leaderboard
projects.description: Show a table of the freeCodeCamp campers who've earned the most brownie points in the past 30 days and how many they've earned total. Built with React.js and Sass
